Welcome.title: Hi
Welcome.subTitle: What do you want to do?

Steps.1: Find out how CoopIA works and how questions are generated.
Steps.2: Find out more about the documents in the database.
Steps.3: Ask CoopIA a question and get a response.

Questions.title: You can ask whatever you want!

Examples.1: What are the CVI3 cables delivered quantites from my customer Airbus Nantes order of last month?
Examples.2: What is the confirmed delivery date for my customer order 4513131010?

Examples.1: What should I do when i have an error code I205 on my ELB?
Examples.2: How many cycles with the eBlueTork can I get on one battery charge?
Examples.3: I need to thighten at 0.7Nm, which ELB model fit my needs?
Examples.4: What is the compatibility of this spare part 61153968375 with other tools?
Examples.5: What is the best replacing tool for SH70-LR1100-S90-A4S?

Examples.1: Can you give me lastest stock status for DR300 and when is planned the phase out?
Examples.2: Which items by customer Airbus Atlantic bought the last 2 years are going to be phase out in the next 6 months?

Examples.1: Who is the Global Key Account Manager that can help me with quoting at Forvia?
Examples.2: Who has sold ATEX tools to an Oil and Gas plant in the last 12 months and can help me for quoting?

Examples.1: Make a summary of this document
Examples.2: Is it the latest version of this document?

ChatPromptInput.typeYourMessage: Type your message or “/” to see suggestions

Chat.answerLoading: I'm gathering all the tools at my disposal...
Chat.clearConversationDesc: In a few cases, reset conversation history may improve response quality

POSITIVE.desc: Tell us why you think this answer was helpful

NEGATIVE.desc: Tell us why you think this answer was not helpful

Reasoning.get_order_by_reference: I’m searching for an order with this reference
Reasoning.get_partnumber_from_serialnumber: I’m retrieving the part number of this serial number
Reasoning.order_search: I’m searching for an order based on the provided data
Reasoning.product_documents: I’m looking for a document matching the criteria
Reasoning.product_maintenance: I’m looking for maintenance information about this product
Reasoning.product_search: Im looking for a product based on the provided data
Reasoning.rag_search: I’m looking for an answer within the knowledge base based on the provided data
Reasoning.slt_search: I’m gathering information about leadtime, stock and price information for this product
Reasoning.get_competitor_alternative: I’m looking for a competitor product alternative within our product catalog
Reasoning.get_competitor_products: I’m looking for a competitor product matching the provided data

Tools.slt_search: Stock, Lead Time and Price Information
